data.app_name: First Person Tennis - The Real Tennis Simulator
data.description:
Welcome to the First Person Tennis, the first tennis simulator developed for VR.

First Person Tennis uses the most innovative physics engine to reproduce the real tennis shots in VR. Thanks to the support of a big community and professional tennis players, the game is in an endless development to reach an incredible level of realism.  

First Person Tennis is for all ages and tennis players, the simulator has different levels of difficulty and options for any need.

Join First Person Tennis Discord to find friends, opponents and play online tournaments every months with big prizes.
https://discord.gg/9rtH7VuwSd

Features: 
- Arcade and Simulation mode.
- Online Multiplayer.
- Mixed Reality.
- 3 different ways to run through the court: Teleport, Run in Place, Sliding Run.
- One handed serve.
- 7 different court surfaces: clay, grass, hard, blue-green hard, classic synthetic, indoor hard and indoor synthetic.
- 13 tournaments: 4 Slam and 9 Masters. 
- Global Leaderboard. 
- Fully customizable 3D characters.

changelog.change_log:
• Friends list is instantly updated now (if Ready For Challenge button is disabled) 
• You can send a challenge to a friend if the racket icon is green (if Ready For Challenge button is disabled)
• Fixed wrong side bug after a foot fault or over time
• Timer is stopped now when opponent quits
• Fixed match doesn't start automatically when challenge is accepted

• Friends list is instantly updated now (if Ready For Challenge button is disabled)

• Fixed wrong side bug after a foot fault or over time
• Timer is stopped now when opponent quits
• Fixed match doesn't start automatically when challenge is accepted

- New lobby
- Friends list
- Black list
- Ping ball
- Button to set the return position in training
- Fixed all online async bugs
- Fixed ranking points bugs
- Improved online performance
- Improved autorun positioning
- Improved net impact
- Improved visibility
- Ball trail on opponent serve
